examples: Selaginella corallina (Riddell) Wilbur & Whitson in Amer. Fern J. 95(4): 162. 2005 [P example]; Calliphysalis Whitson, Rhodora 114(958): 137. 2012
notes: The first name Margaret cited in Amer. Fern J. (95(4): 162. 2005) seems to be an error for Mary.
